name: Gunshroom
description:
The Fungi folk have had enough of hipster 'Foragers' coming to their homelands and taking away their sisters and cousins away to eat them.

No More!!

The time has come to pick up your trusty mushroom gun and fight back.

----------------------------------------------------------------

A Twin Stick Mushroom based Arcade Shoot em up made for Alakajam 14.

https://alakajam.com/14th-alakajam/1296/gunshroom/

----------------------------------------------------------------

Supports Mouse/Keyboard or Gamepad style input.

Controls

Mouse/Keyboard

- WASD or arrows to move, mouse to aim, left click to shoot, right click to dash.

Gamepad

-  Left Stick to Move, Right Stick to Aim, Right Trigger to Shoot, Left Trigger to Dash
